Description:
Exciting Rural Lifestyle Opportunity
Set across 2.4 ha 5.9 acres approx of beautifully manicured land, this property is a must-see for anyone wanting to experience rural life without forgoing lifes luxuries. All bases are covered with three paddocks, ample shedding, attractive gardens, and a modern 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom plus study home with an enormous garage and swimming pool. With the hard work already done, this enviable lifestyle is yours for the taking.
Recently renovated, features include tallowwood flooring, and a stylish kitchen with granite & stone composite benches, 900mm cooker and soft-close cabinetry. Admire the abundant rose garden, verdant lawns & mature elms from the living areas which flow seamlessly to an extravagant outdoor room boasting all the extras: TV with Foxtel, bar, BBQ - kitchen, ceiling fan, cafe blinds and wood heater. 28 solar panels help power the home, allowing for guilt-free operation of the twin ducted split systems year-round. Waters not an issue either, with 60,000-litre storage in place. Grey/rainwater reticulation supports three raised veggie boxes, a greenhouse and an extremely productive orchard. NBN internet connection is strong.
The master bedroom comes with WIR & ensuite; the other 3 have floor-to-ceiling wardrobes. Bathrooms are opulent; the main bathroom boasts a walk-in shower and large bath.
Enjoy a tree change in a central location on the Bellarine Peninsula, a short drive to major shops, schools and attractions, just 90 minutes from Melbourne and 20 minutes from Geelong.. Call Peter Lindeman today!
Insights: 265-271 Rhinds Road, Wallington VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Savvy Starter Oozing Retro Charm!
What an opportunity to secure your slice of the ever so popular Bellarine market! This solid brick beauty sits on a 591m2 block and offers itself in a multitude of ways and would be a fantastic first home, investor or next project.
Screened by an established, private front garden with a long, gated driveway leading to a SLUG offers ample room for multiple cars, caravans and everything in between for secure storage.
The home oozes original retro charm and allows for your imagine to run wild! The hub of the home lends itself in the way of a fully equipped and spacious kitchen which overlooks a light-filled living and dining space, equipped with a cosy wood log fire and split system offering all year-round comfort. A separate lounge sits at the fore, and comprises 3 large bedrooms all with built-in-robes, central family bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry sits at the rear and offers access to the lush back garden which offers dappled shade with an array of tree's, plants and planter boxes and all complete by a undercover verandah.
Leave the car at home, as a short stroll has you in the center of Drysdale and all amenities, schools, public transport and medical facilities. With the reserve and lake precinct at the end of the street, this property ticks all the boxes and offers incredible, entry level buying.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 117 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
One Of A Kind
This bespoke residence boasts a one of a kind sophistication that will excite a prospective purchaser with the highest of expectations! A visual delight; towering raked timber ceilings, feature pine-lined Clerestory windows promote an abundance of natural light, the free flowing floor plan creates a seamless connection to beautifully appointed hardwood decked alfresco (the perfect vantage point to admire the Heather Vincent designed garden setting), an enviable northerly aspect, this meticulously maintained build endorses this home has been very much loved and presents a genuine 'turn key' prospect all the hard work has been done! Set within the highly desirable Golf Course precinct and a short walk to the water's edge creates the ultimate 'sea change'!
3 beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite. The 2 additional bedrooms are generously proportioned and feature walk in robes.
The primary living zone consists of a light and bright kitchen/family/meals zone; wonderful use of windows give you a sense of bringing the picturesque surrounds 'inside'. The kitchen is complete with expansive bench tops, excellent storage and quality fixtures & fittings.
The 2nd independent living area is simply stunning and delivers a feeling of grandeur; showcasing a towering timber lined raked ceiling profile, exceptional size and scale, custom window furnishings, crisp neutral finishes compliment the warmth and character of the timber architraves/windows.
Without a doubt this home will appeal to the 'entertainer'; the expansive wrap around hardwood deck is accessible via dual Stegbar patio doors. An appealing spot to take in an early coffee or an evening glass of wine from one of the award-winning local wineries
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, x3 split system cooling units, ceiling fans all compliment a home boasting exceptional liveability features
The A+ location can simply not be understated; set right in the heart of the Golf Course precinct, the water's edge only a short stroll away, a fully equipped retail centre, public transport, tranquil parklands and walking tracks provide just a hint to the enviable lifestyle features on offer.
The Bellarine Peninsula has quickly established itself as one of the most highly sought 'sea change' destinations. Award winning wine labels, a vibrant restaurant and café scene, highly regarded fishing prospects and passenger ferry service to Docklands.

Description:
Seaside Living With Two Dwellings Under One Roof!
This property is currently UNDER OFFER subject to a condition to be met. If you are interested in the property, please feel free to contact Wes on 0419 315 727.
Showcasing two self-contained dwellings under one roof, this residence provides buyers with endless options! Occupy the upper level with sparkling bay views while you lease out the lower level, join the Airbnb trend and reap the benefits of a potential dual income, or secure a spacious holiday home for the whole family to enjoy!
With the coastline just 3 houses from your front door, a carefree lifestyle is yours to keep. Enjoy leisurely strolls along the sandy beach, spend fun-filled days swimming with the children and grandchildren, or snorkel to explore the beautiful reefs. A selection of the Bellarines finest wineries are virtually on your doorstep, while the boat ramp and Clifton Springs Golf Course are wonderfully close by. The Portarlington Ferry keeps you effortlessly connected to the Melbourne Docklands. Public transport and local shops are a short stroll away, while the bustling hub of Drysdale places all of the essentials within easy reach. Families will be spoilt for choice with easy access to Beacon Point Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, Drysdale Primary School and Christian College (Prep-9 Bellarine Campus).
Dwelling 1, Upstairs: - 212.90m2 (22.91 Sqrs) + Balcony 1- 13.73m2 (1.48 Sqrs) + Balcony 2- 56.60m2 (6.09 Sqrs) Total Area 283.24m2 (30.48 Sqrs)
High, square-set ceilings and Spotted Gum floorboards enhance the sleek interiors of 'The Main Dwelling'. The layout has been designed to maximise the northern light and showcase breathtaking views over the bay and You Yangs. The spacious lounge/living zone opens onto a balcony, while the kitchen/dining zone unites with another sheltered alfresco area. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a walk-in pantry and stainless-steel appliances (oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher). The Master Bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes, bathroom, separate toilet, and European laundry complete the upper level.
Dwelling 2, Ground Floor: - 154.37m2 (16.61 Sqrs) + Garage - 81.20m2 (8.74 Sqrs) + Outdoor Alfresco 53m2 (5.7Sqrs) Total Area 288.57m2 (31.06 Sqrs)
High, square-set ceilings and burnished concrete floors are featured throughout the lower level. The open plan family/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the spacious sheltered alfresco area creating a breezy indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for both everyday living and entertaining. The kitchen makes a stylish statement in black and white. The island bench conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar, while appliances include an oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, and dishwasher. The generous Guest Bedroom overlooks the front garden with water views, while two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the sparkling bathroom. The powder room and laundry complete the lower level.
Other features of this superb property include raked and high set ceilings, double-glazing, solar panels & hydronic heating. With provisions in place for a lift, this home is also ideal for those planning to retire close to the sea. The remote lock-up garage provides secure parking for three vehicles, plus a rear remote roller door onto the backyard perfect for storing a boat or caravan! The double carport offers additional off-street parking. The secure backyard promotes sustainable living with a veggie garden, rainwater tank, and chook pen.
An opportunity like this doesnt come along often! Enquire today!

Description:
Set to Tick All of Your Boxes
This much-loved home has been tastefully updated and will be a delight from the moment you walk through the front door. Located in the heart of Leopold this is a great opportunity to secure a beautiful family home in a prime location.
This quality brick veneer home is situated on a corner allotment of 656m2 approx. With plenty on offer this home includes three generous sized bedrooms, two separate living zones, two bathrooms and ample car accommodation. The master bedroom is located at the front of the home for peace and privacy. A walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the tastefully renovated ensuite features a large shower, single vanity, and toilet. The two additional bedrooms offer built-in robes and utilise the main central bathroom and separate toilet. Take your pick of two separate living zones, you can enjoy the open plan kitchen & living space to relax and entertain, while the more formal lounge & dining zone is large enough for all the family and friends to gather on those special occasions. The updated kitchen compromises nothing but quality. With beautiful stone bench tops, Bosch Pyrolytic oven, induction cook top & dishwasher, all while overlooking the lovely front courtyard for you to enjoy.
Outdoors offers an oversized double garage with room for shelving, storage and internal access to the home. The outdoor undercover entertaining area is perfect for entertaining on those summer nights. As an added bonus this property has a second crossover and secure side access perfect for extra car, caravan or boat storage. All this is complimented by immaculately manicured gardens, just waiting for you to move in.
Added extras include 2x gas wall furnaces, split system cooling, ceiling fans, and updated quality carpet throughout.
This home is an absolute MUST SEE boasting phenomenal presentation and a sensational location, this is move in ready.

Description:
AN ABUNDANCE OF SPACE WITH BAY VIEWS
Situated in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs surrounded by quality homes and in close proximity to the golf club, bowls club & swimming beaches is this brilliant opportunity to secure a 1300m2 parcel of land with a spacious home. Offering 3 bedrooms downstairs including master with ensuite, study and multiple living spaces and 2 further bedrooms with retreat and balcony upstairs to enjoy beautiful sunsets and sweeping bay views. This home enjoys an open plan kitchen, dining and living space which flows out to an expansive deck overlooking the luxurious solar heated swimming pool, ideal for entertaining. There is ample storage space with a large shed, high set carport and workshop for the handy man or tradesman and those looking to store a boat or caravan. This unique property also features a rumpus room with separate access making it an ideal choice for those looking to run a business from home or a teenagers retreat. Further features of this fantastic home include ducted heating, split systems, wood fire, ducted vacuum system and an outdoor grassed play area. With so much space on offer, this home will appeal to growing and extended families and those needing extra storage and room to move!

Description:
Great Bones Here
As your walking to the front door you can see the bay, Geelong & even skilled stadium. Perfect 1st home or investment property on a terrific corner block of 581m2. Large light filled lounge has garden views, gas heater, split system & 2 ceiling fans. Open plan dining & timber kitchen has electric wall oven & grill plus a range hood over 4 electric hot plates. There are plenty cupboards for all your storage needs. Supersized bathroom has a deep bath, seperate shower & toilet. 2 big bedrooms one with free standing robes & the other has built in robes. Double linen closet in the hall just off the laundry that has rear yard access & pocket bay view's off the back porch. Outside is a garden shed, water tank & single car garage with double side gates giving you plenty of room to park your boat, caravan or tradies trailer. Surrounded by low maintenance gardens & new colour bond fences.
Just minutes to all amenities you could need including local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport & medical facilities. Plus everything the Bellarine lifestyle has to offer such as the bay, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services & wineries just to mention a few.

Description:
A PERFECT HOME , DILIGENTLY MAINTAINED, GARDEN HAVEN!
What a delight this home is, you feel like you just what to stay and relax, so light and bright . Walk to the jetty, clubs and parklands, a great position. Formal lounge room at front with the second open plan living area at rear of home overlooking lush gardens and undercover patio. The master bedroom is at the front , has ensuite and WIR, remaining two are off the hallway at the rear, both have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features central heating, split system, pantry, dishwasher, quality fittings and more to impress. Double access allowing for multiple usage, double garage, caravan port and two workshops. So impressive has been much loved and it shows, come and have a look now.

Description:
PROMINENT LARGE BLOCK, CHOOSE YOUR ADVENTURE
"State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 10 people, social distancing still applies"
In this current climate you may be looking for a project to keep you busy while you are in isolation or choosing to work remotely. A project that has your mind focused on something new and innovative. An escapism from the current world situation.
Firstly we will be offering staggered private inspections Saturday May 9th between 12.00pm and 12.30pm. So if you have an interest in this home be quick to call to lock in your time. So if you have an interest in this home be quick to call to lock in your time. Please be advised that inspections on this home are still permissible with the new updated Covid19 Stage 3 regulations
Just to market is a large block (920m2 approx) with an older house on it in the main street of Drysdale. The potential is available for subdivision (STCA) or if you like working with your hands and watch as you transform something old to new again you may choose the option of restoring this home from the ground up.
The prospective purchaser may like to consider renting the home out while working on a subdivision project. With a Residential Growth Zone the City of Greater Geelong will be able to assist with guidelines for development.
The historic town of Drysdale operates in the 21st century with all the necessary amenities to work live and play. With the new Childrenâs Centre over the road doors may open up for Child based support such as Speech Therapy, Parenting Support Network, Playgroup, Occasional Care etc. A few more ideas for you to consider on this site.
Private inspection welcome and encouraged under Stage 3 Covid-19 restrictions.

Description:
Lovingly Renovated Classic Brick Home
The Feel:
This classic brick home has been lovingly renovated, bringing it into modernity with contemporary features for todays lifestyle requirements. The original façade meets new surfaces including Bluestone & porcelain tiles, Merbau & Spotted Gum decks & durable bamboo floors throughout. The spacious yard is ideal for a down-sizer, or perfect for a young family as the house lends itself to extension into the expansive backyard (STCA). 2 large bedrooms, plus a versatile 3rd BR/Study, complement the north-facing home with verdant outlooks & Bay glimpses.
The Facts:
-Quality home with generously proportionated backyard & room for extension in big yard (STCA)
-First impressions of neat brick veneer exterior finish with well-kept gardens & refreshed entrance
-Cosy lounge room offers relaxed living with SSAC & views of garden & deck
-Gas log fire set in Redgum mantlepiece w/ Caesarstone hearth & porcelain tile surround
-Durable bamboo floors & double roller blinds throughout
-Perfectly maintained, with roof tiles recently cleaned/de-mossed/repaired
-Well-equipped kitchen w/ SSAC features quality cabinetry & Westinghouse/Smeg appliances including dishwasher
-Meals area flows seamlessly to Spotted Gum deck, encompassing rural views & Bay glimpses
-Glass balustrade w/ marine grade steel rails add contemporary appeal
-BBQ plumbed to gas & RC awning to north deck, plus UV awnings to all other windows
-2 spacious bedrooms with BIRs & RC ceiling fans (Master with SSAC) + versatile 3rd BR/Study
-Central bathroom with shower, bath & toilet, heated towel rail & Tastic heater
-5.3Kw solar panels, double glazed & tinted windows to most + Crimsafe security doors
-All new boundary fences, fully secure for kids & pets
-Merbau deck under dappled light of huge elm & productive fig tree amongst native gardens
-Fantastic location; close to all facilities & easy access to the best of the Bellarine
-Ample OSP with large carport, SLUG with workshop area, & garden shed at rear
The Owner Loves
With views across the rolling hills & glimpses of the Bay, & surrounded by neighbouring trees & gardens that complement our own much-loved gardens, we love the sense of privacy yet space we get from our deck...

Description:
Immaculate modern living
The presentation of this property is truly outstanding. Sparkling clean and in immaculate condition, you won't need to do anything except move in and enjoy all this location offers. Minutes to the local shopping centre and primary school, walking distance to parkland and public transport and only 15 minutes to Geelong CBD and coastal areas this property offers low maintenance living in a very convenient position.
Comprising a central hallway, formal lounge/sitting area, open plan kitchen/dining/family with stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, fanforced oven and dishwasher. This area has plenty of natural light, with west facing windows overlooking the rear yard and opens out through sliding doors to the undercover entertaining area. There four bedrooms - master with walk in robe and ensuite, the remaining three each have built in robes. The main bathroom provides a separate bath and shower and separate toilet.
Extras include ducted heating throughout, reverse cycle AC, gas boosted solar hot water, large garden shed and water tank. Outdoors is a very impressive and perfectly manicured lawn, landscaped gardens and a remote controlled double garage with internal house access plus a rear roller door to the back yard. Allotment approximately 399sqm.
Certain to suit first home buyers, couples, downsizers and investors, with an estimated rental income of $400 per week. Step inside this home and your search is sure to be over.
Please note, all information is provided by third parties. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the accuracy of information relating to properties. Eastwood Andrews will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information supplied.

Description:
A WONDERFUL SURPRISE! SOLAR PANELS! CARAVAN SPACE!
Take your time to come and view No. 11, it is diligently maintained and with the added bonus of nothing to do but unpack. A generous lounge room as well as second open plan living area including well equipped kitchen, dining and sitting area which opens to the outdoor entertaining space....a wealth of living all light and bright. The master bedroom has WIR and ensuite , remaining two with BIR'S, central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry. Features include reverse cycle heating and cooling , solar panels cast iron fireplace, pantry, fans, excellent storage, quality fittings and more to impress. Double garage with direct home access, carport for the boat and/or caravan. This home makes the living easy on the Bellarine Penisula.

Description:
ATTENTION TO DETAIL HERE AT NO. 12 AND F.H.O.G $20,000
Brilliant design by G.J. Gardner in this award winning area, a real surprise when inspecting. The plan takes advantage of the natural light and provides a generous living situation. The open plan area has a well designed kitchen, dining and living, all overlooking and opening to the outdoor entertainment area. The second lounge room provides that flexible space , read , listen to music.....just good to have the option. Four bedrooms, the master with ensuite (double shower) and WIR, all with BIR'S , central bathroom, laundry and toilet. Features include central heating, split system, walk in pantry, wide stone benches, 900 mm stove, S.S. appliances, good storage , quality fittings and more. Double garage with internal access and landscaped matured gardens complete the picture. This 2016 built home is eligible for $20,000 bonus for first time buyers , absolute bliss for the downsizer as well, Situated in this award winning developement and within walking distance of the village and all amenities. Ring me for an inspection.

Description:
Passive Solar Design Mud Brick Home On 4.8 Acres
Bordering the McGlashans Wallington Estate, this property presents a fantastic opportunity upon approx. 4.8 acres! Two large paddocks will instantly appeal to hobby farmers, while this superb location is ideal for setting up a bespoke restaurant or Airbnb (STCA)!
Set within the Bellarine Peninsulas wine region, you can enjoy living moments from the popular Flying Brick Cider and Oakdene Vineyards. Adventure Park is wonderfully close by, along with the Wallington Park Equestrian Centre. Easy access to Wallington Primary School, Bellarine Secondary College, and St Ignatius College puts the practical elements in place for families. Just jump in the car, and youll soon be in the heart of Geelong or discovering all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
With the neighbouring vineyards surrounding the north and eastern sides of the property, youll fall in love with this idyllic outlook - imagine entertaining loved ones in your very own backyard with a view like that!
Still in its original condition, the architecturally-designed home invites you to move straight in while also offering scope for further enhancement (STCA). Boasting a passive solar design, the home features wide external eaves, an abundance of north-facing windows, 1.5KW solar panels, and a 25 000L rainwater tank.
Lime-washed timber panelling and clay brick walls ooze character, while raked ceilings with clerestory windows welcome in an abundance of natural light. An open fireplace creates a cosy ambience in the formal lounge/dining area, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone features a Coonara wood heater. The kitchen is well equipped with a large walk-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, stainless steel oven, and electric cooktop).
The spacious Master Bedroom boasts external access, a walk-in robe, and en suite. Three additional bedrooms are complete with built-in robes. The generous study, main bathroom, powder room, and laundry complete the layout.
A split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans provide modern comfort, while wireless NBN connection is already in place.
Outside, a grapevine drapes over the potential-packed alfresco that overlooks the orchard. Home to apples, almonds, cherries, and more, you can enjoy fresh produce straight from the branch!
The automatic front gate adds an element of convenience. The tall double carport is ideal for storing caravans or boats, while the lock-up garage accommodates four vehicles. The work shed is perfect for tradies or hobby farmers looking to store equipment.
With this property, the possibilities are truly endless! Inspect without delay!

Description:
SOLID START PROPERTY OR SAVVY INVESTMENT
This well presented 2 bed, 1 bath, 1 car townhouse, set on its own title in a well-established quiet Leopold pocket would suit an array of buyers, whether you're looking for a fabulous first home, neat downsizer property or savvy investment with a potential rent of $330pw approx.
Set on approx. 240m2 in a quiet Leopold pocket with nearby parklands and being only a stones throw to Leopold school and shops, this neatly presented 2 bedroom townhouse in a modern colour palette offers compact modern living with security and side gate access to your carport with double 3mt lockable gates.
Comprising of secure neat front garden with privacy tinted windows, you step foot into the large modern open plan' living room equipped with Fujitsu Inverter Reverse cycle split system for all year round comfort.
The spacious kitchen offers ample bench space, 4 burner gas cooktop and electric oven, modern tiled splash back and has room for a small dining setting.
Down the hall you will find 2 carpeted bedrooms, main room with BIR, modern ceiling fan, block out blinds and a neat front garden outlook. The central bathroom offers corner shower, sunken bath, modern vanity and heat lamps for those chilly mornings.
Outside offers multiple courtyard spaces, all zoned, making it ideal for pets. The back courtyard offers undercover pergola and high privacy fencing ideal for entertaining. The front courtyard is pretty as a postcard with evergreen lawn and established plants.
This well presented first start property is ideally located in growing Leopold, close to Shopping Village, Bunnings, nearby schools and parks, plus 15 minutes to the Bellarine and 10km to Geelong CBD.
IT IS A MUST TO INSPECT!
FEATURES
Own title on 240m2 approx
$330pw rent approx
Fujitsu Heat/Cool Split System
Updated throughout
Secure front and back courtyards
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
This Humble Abode is UNDER CONTRACT!
It's hard not to let this humble home tug on the heart strings, why? Because it feels like home from the moment you walk through the front door. 29 Amarina Road exudes an inviting feeling perhaps because of the cozy footprint or the light filled and airy renovated spaces, it's an ideal package which will tick off the criteria for the majority of the market.
A huge highlight of the home is the stunning location. Walking distance to the beach, golf course and the Dell you have no option but to inherit the fantastic lifestyle that is on offer.
This fastidiously kept home comprises three bedrooms, all with robes, separated by a centrally positioned modern bathroom. The light filled living area flows nicely into the kitchen/dining area. The kitchen is equipped with soft close cabinetry, quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. A fully functional laundry stems off the kitchen with external access.
All the hard work has been done, a clean crisp yet simple renovation means that you can move in right away, alternately a fantastic property to add to your investment portfolio. Other features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, re-painted, new floor furnishings, new internal lighting & single carport accommodation. The property also offers a secure rear yard with a large undercover and enclosed entertaining area, perfect for year round gatherings.
A truly rare package in a sought-after location, on offer at an affordable price. An inspection is a must to appreciate this meticulous little package!

Description:
IMMACULATELY PRESENTED
Here is a solid first home opportunity with all the bells and whistles. Modern kitchen and bathrooms, new floor coverings, fresh paintwork throughout, central heating and much more. For the young tradie there is massive secure parking under carport 13m long and garage approx 7.5m x 6m . Two additional garden sheds 3 x 3m with concrete flooring.
The home has a pleasant, welcoming feel with plenty of light filtering in to the living areas. Three good sized bedrooms, BIRs, fans, plenty of storage, 900ss Technika oven and SSDW.
The manicured, private front garden has an oriental feel. Close to public transport and only a few minutes in the car to the main Drysdale Shopping hub.

Description:
Private, quiet, spacious and ready to go!
This lovely spacious home set amongst a lush garden on 653m2 is a quiet sanctuary for those who love to be home! Comprising 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living plus dining room and Galley kitchen. The entry of the home is down a long pathway with the 3-car carport and garden and lawn area on the northern aspect of the property. The layout has 3 of the 4 bedrooms at the front of the home. These are generous in size and all feature built in robes apart from the main which has a walk-in robe to the ensuite. A single bedroom is located near the front door. The 2 living rooms are located side by side toward the rear of the home with one being adjacent to the galley kitchen and the second next to the formal dining. The kitchen features electric cooktop and oven a dishwasher and large space for a fridge. Climate control is via wall furnaces and airconditioning. Outside are 2 garden sheds, undercover BBQ pergola, lawn and garden to the rear and fernery and water tank on the southern side of the home. With plenty of scope for updating this really is a gorgeous property, spacious, private and quiet. Close to school, bus routes and only moments away from Leopold's Gateway Plaza it is an ideal home or investment. You'll need to be quick to inspect this one!
Rental Estimate $380/week
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Immaculate and Low Maintenance
Boasting a pleasant street appeal and immaculate interior to follow, this 4 bedroom home, plus study is sure to impress upon inspection. The master bedroom features a WIR and ensuite , the other 3 bedrooms are also a great size with WIR, fans and are serviced by the family bathroom. The beautiful kitchen features stainless steel appliances and is adjoined to the generous 2nd living area/ dining area. Outside features a deck ideal for entertaining friends and family when they come over, the low maintenance and established gardens add to the relaxing appeal of this home. Other features include large separate laundry, double garage with internal access, 5kW solar panels, gas central heating and air conditioning unit strategically placed with the lounge to keep you comfortable in every season. Your inspection will not disappoint.

Description:
A HOUSE, A SHED AND 611 SQM
Thats what you are buying when you buy this Clifton Springs cracker. Set on 611 sq meters of land in a quiet Clifton Springs court and close to the under construction public play space is this ideal addition to your portfolio or first home. A quaint 2 bedroom home with pine lined ceilings and exposed beams is set at the front of the block allowing access to the massive 6m x 10m garage perfect for the tools, the toys & the trailers. Call today to book your inspection time so you don't miss this brilliant opportunity!

Description:
The perfect first home.
Situated in a family friendly pocket of Leopold, this home has a lot to offer and is sure to tick the boxes for first homeowners, young families and investors.
Behind the bold façade, this home offers 3 spacious bedrooms, a large study or 4th bedroom, 2 living zones, and a secure back yard perfect for those with pets or young children.
The large entry leads down the hallway to the light filled and open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The kitchen offers a large gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher and plentiful storage.
Accommodation is well-appointed by way of a master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, as well as 2 bedrooms to the rear of the home, both with built in robes. The study offers ample space to be utilised as a 4th bedroom.
Features include: Gas central heating, split system air conditioning and a double remote garage with internal access.
Located only a 2 minute drive to the Gateway Plaza, 15 minutes to the Geelong CBD, 15 Minutes to the Bellarine Peninsular and 15 Minutes to Ocean Grove's pristine beaches; this property is central, practical and represents great value in today's market.
